title: Meta Connect 2025: What to expect and how to watch
content: Meta is expected to unveil new versions of its AI-powered smart glasses, as well as a gesture-indicating wristband.
author: Maxwell Zeff
summary:
Key Takeaway: Meta is set to unveil its latest advancements in AI-powered wearable technology, including updated smart glasses and a gesture-tracking wristband, at its upcoming Meta Connect 2025 event.

Why It Matters: These new products showcase Meta's continued push into the realm of augmented reality and human-computer interaction, potentially shaping the future of how we interface with digital information and our surroundings.

Brief Context: As a leading tech giant, Meta (formerly Facebook) has been heavily invested in developing innovative wearable devices and exploring the potential of mixed reality. The upcoming Meta Connect event will provide a glimpse into the company's latest developments in this rapidly evolving space, which could have significant implications for how we live, work, and interact with technology in the years to come.

faq.question: What is the Meta Connect 2025 event?
faq.answer: The Meta Connect 2025 event is an annual conference hosted by Meta (formerly Facebook) to showcase their latest virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and other technology innovations. The 2025 edition is expected to feature updates on Meta's AI-powered smart glasses and a new gesture-indicating wristband.

faq.question: What new products will Meta announce at Connect 2025?
faq.answer: t the Connect 2025 event, Meta is expected to unveil the next generation of its AI-powered smart glasses, which could include improved computer vision, voice controls, and integration with other Meta devices and services. The company is also rumored to be announcing a new gesture-indicating wristband that can track hand movements and translate them into digital commands.

faq.question: How can I watch the Meta Connect 2025 event?
faq.answer: The Meta Connect 2025 event will be livestreamed on Meta's website and social media channels, including Facebook and YouTube. Attendees can also watch the event in person if they purchase tickets. The event date and registration details will be announced closer to the event.

faq.question: What are the key features of Meta's AI-powered smart glasses?
faq.answer: Meta's smart glasses are designed to blend virtual and augmented reality experiences with AI-powered features. Some of the key features expected in the next generation include improved computer vision for object and text recognition, voice controls for hands-free operation, and integration with other Meta devices like the Oculus VR headsets.

faq.question: How will Meta's gesture-indicating wristband work?
faq.answer: The rumored gesture-indicating wristband from Meta is expected to use advanced sensors and machine learning to track the wearer's hand movements and translate them into digital commands. This could allow users to control virtual interfaces, games, and other applications without the need for physical controllers or touchscreens.
